concept.title: Viewing JMX Metrics in External Tools
concept.shortdesc: You can view the JMX metrics in external tools. The JMX metric names all begin with "sdc.pipeline."

conbody.p: JMX metricsviewing in external tools JVM metrics use the following naming pattern:
conbody.codeblock: sdc.pipeline.<pipeline name>.<pipeline revision>.<category: pipeline|stage|custom>.\ [<stage library>_<library revision>].<metric name>.<metric type>
conbody.p: For example, the following is a batch count meter for the first revision of a pipeline named Write to Kafka:

The following metric is a counter for the memory consumed by the File Tail origin in the same Write to Kafka pipeline:sdc.pipeline.Write to Kafka.0.stage.\ com_streamsets_pipeline_stage_origin_logtail_FileTailDSource_1.memoryConsumed.counter
